Project Description Description Specification Support Inquiry Bill Payment Kiosks & Payment Self Service Hardware Solutions Available from 10.1-inch to 43-inch, Standard and Custom Hardware, with modular design peripherals, All can be easily customized to include client-specific flow requirements. Description Built To Last: Commercial Grade Our bill payment kiosks are designed and built with full consideration of commercial application scenarios where 7/24/365 durability is a must, thus every components employed are commercial grade to ensure the consistent performance in industrial environments, heavy-duty use. Proprietary Solution With Design-in Support Our payment kiosk solutions are designed and built under one single roof from board-level SMT, tooling development to production, via owning the complete process, we are able to support any design-in request with very tight delivery target. We are able to quickly modify our standard hardware to fit your custom installation and mounting profiles, no matter it is pedestal, countertop or wall mount. In addition, we provide support for real-time alerts and status visibility of connectivity, application & components with Iot signaling. Safety Lowest Product Failure Rate, Product Life-circle Support; Efficiency Increase productivity and decrease costs; Peace of mind Proprietary, modular-base solution with interplay of hardware & software. >> Our Process Project Goal Recognition We understand each customer has their own unique knowledge about industrial smart electronics solution, they may face different challenges, thus have different project requirements with different expectation. Due to the above, the starting point of our job is to recognize the actual project target, helping our customers address the multiple aspects of the whole project, from installation, user experience to maintenance. Diagnosis Our product team together with skilled engineers, project managers and customer success executives would engage directly with customer's cross-functional teams, to obtain the full view of client's challenge as well as the possible untapped pain, while presenting clients the existing solutions & case studies , thus clients could make better decisions about what they should buy. Research & Design We are able to develop the customized hardware and software precisely as per clients confirmed requirements. Validation We would quickly develop a concept-of-approval prototype to realize what clients need, in order to validate the requirements Test & Trial We would implement comprehensive testing via trial production, ensuring zero risk of mass-production failure. Mass Production & Launch Mass productions come as carefully planned, informed of our customers, with daily logging data shared so that shipment schedule could be reassured. Project Description Description Specification Support Inquiry Desktop Payment POS & Self-Service Kiosk Featuring Facial Recognition Payment, 2D Code With Keypad & Thermal Printer A Smart Helper Guiding Customers in Self-checkout, Making Self-service Easier Than Ever Before. Description A Lightsome Kiosk For Stores in All Sizes With Natural Fit On Desktop Droid1330K is designed to simplify the payment experience in retail stores. It has a slope angle to fit the natural viewing habits of store shoppers, and it stands firmly on desktop thanks to its triangle design. No more fixture kit, it fits naturally. As a user friendly payment & service kiosk, it has placed the 2D code scanner on the frontal bottom and facial recognition camera on frontal top, thus, there is no learning curve both for store operators as well as shoppers in point of sale. Built-in Thermal Printer & Keypad On Rear Side Saving Space & Being Customer-Friendly Receipts of all transactions will be printed automatically for customers to check the purchased items, the thermal printer has been built-into the rear side with an access door for changing till rolls. Sometimes, when a custom payment amount is needed saying some extra service has not been listed in POS database, the store operator could input the value manually via the keypad on back. Not Just A Payment Terminal Droid1330K is not just a payment terminal, it is also used in getting new customers, simplifying store operation, automating self-checkout and contactless self-pick'n go via facial-ID or 2D code scanning, Delivering great shopping experience to customers. Specification Quad-Core Or 6-Core Processor RK3288 Quadcore Or RK3399 6-Core IPS HD Screen 13.3-inch Full Viewing Angle Capacitive Touchscreen 10-Point Multi-Touch 2GB or 4GB RAM For Speedy Response Facial Recognition Available With Single-lens, dual lens and 3D structural camera Developer Friendly Android OS Dedicated Android OS With Rich API For Developers 4G LTE 4G LTE Optional With Built-in PCI Socket Thermal Printer 58mm thermal printer on rear Android 7.1 Android OS 7.1 Model No. Droid1330K Display 13.3" (337.8 mm) diagonal, color LCD, LED backlit Resolution 1920x1080 pixels Viewing Angle 178° horizontal, 178° vertical Touchscreen Projected capacitive NFC Card Reader Optional, Support protocals ISO14443A, ISO14443B,IOS15693,ISO18092, Felica with APDU commands Thermal Printer 58mm( with auto cutter ) 2D Code Scanner Supports 1D, 2D codes, distance 5-20cm 4G LTE Optional Biometric Camera 2.0 MP pixels ( single lens, dual‐lens, 3D optional ) Installation Place-N-Play ( No Extra Custom Kiosk Enclosure ) Dimension 425.9*221.8*190.7mm Weight 4.8kgs Available Extension Available with 8-inch, 10.1-inch With Similar Design Styles Processor Rockchip Dual‐Core Cortex‐A72 1.8GHz + Quad‐core Cortex‐A53 1.4GHz RK3399 (optional with RK3288 ) RAM DDR3, 4GB (eMMC) <2GB for RK3288 ) ROM 16GB OS Android 7.1 I/O Ports 1 x RJ45, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x USB Micro 2.0 OTG, 1 x 3.5mm earphone, 1 x TF card slot, 1 x 12V/3A DC in 5.0mm Jack, RJ11 x1 Power Supply DC 12V, 3A Audio Built-in stereo speakers 20mW @16ohm / 2Wx2 External Speakers Bluetooth 4.2 Media Support 1080P other video decoders (VC-1, MPEG-1/2/4, VP8) Color Black as default, custom color available Storage Temperature ‐15 ‐‐ 65 degrees Working Temperature 0 ‐‐ 50 degrees Storage/Working Humidity 10 ‐‐ 90% Project Description Description Specification Support Inquiry Stand-alone POP Video Screen Up To 43-inch, Framed or Openframed Our POP video screens come in two form factors generally, open frame and framed. The open frame screen is designed for custom retail display integration so that shoppers view the active screen part only, while the framed screen is for easy setup & deployment in the field without custom fixture. Standard functions are Video Loop Only Or Loop & User Activation, they all work with retail advertising accessories like push button, motion sensor, RFID reader, retail LED lighting, etc Custom options available with housing development, playback programming, customized accessorries, etc. Available screen sizes & specifications, please refer to the below table. Description IPS Screens, Full Viewing Angle For More Ads Impression Most of our POP advertising screens employ IPS screen for better color performance and wider viewing angle. IPS Screens are widely used for Apple Products line with its superb color accuracy from all viewing angles, audience won't get much shift in colors or contract from any angle compared with TN screens, this is very important for advertising retail screen, it is not only about the correct, compelling color performance to display a brand's message, but also about how many audience would get the ads video impression, IPS LCD panels' mission is to deliver the Ads content in right color to all the audience at frontal of the screen with its full viewing angle. 1080P / 4K Video Auto Loop & Program Playback These digital pop screen advertising players support 1080P or 4K video playback. We have standard retail advertising solutions which play loop videos only after power on, as well as the interactive digital video screens which play user activated video. All the playbacks could be re-programmed based on custom requirements. Maintenance-Friendly: Frontal Tempered Glass, VESA Mount, Port Proector All our framed video screens come with frontal tempered glass for screen protection, a standard VESA mount 75mm /100mm for installation and the port cover /locker for anti-tampering purpose. Working with retail peripherals for a variety of interactivity options Our retail solutions support full line of retail peripherals like push button, motion sensor, barcode scanner, RFID reader, LED lighting, etc. for various user interactivity. We also support custom projects making our retail video screens work with the retail products to deliver a real product demonstration, for example, A Ring branded doorbell's button will trigger a demo video on the 7-inch open frame retail screen 10cm away, when the button is pressed, the LED ring will be blink just like the real Ring doorbell on the home gate. The open frame screen is designed for custom retail display integration so that shoppers view the active screen part only, while the framed screen is for easy setup & deployment in the field without custom fixture. Standard functions are Video Loop Only Or Loop & User Activation, they all work with retail advertising accessories like push button, motion sensor, RFID reader, retail LED lighting, etc Custom options available with housing development, playback programming, customized accessorries, etc. Available screen sizes & specifications, please refer to the below table. Description IPS Screens, Full Viewing Angle For More Ads Impression Most of our POP advertising screens employ IPS screen for better color performance and wider viewing angle. IPS Screens are widely used for Apple Products line with its superb color accuracy from all viewing angles, audience won't get much shift in colors or contract from any angle compared with TN screens, this is very important for advertising retail screen, it is not only about the correct, compelling color performance to display a brand's message, but also about how many audience would get the ads video impression, IPS LCD panels' mission is to deliver the Ads content in right color to all the audience at frontal of the screen with its full viewing angle. 1080P / 4K Video Auto Loop & Program Playback These digital pop screen advertising players support 1080P or 4K video playback. We have standard retail advertising solutions which play loop videos only after power on, as well as the interactive digital video screens which play user activated video. All the playbacks could be re-programmed based on custom requirements. Maintenance-Friendly: Frontal Tempered Glass, VESA Mount, Port Proector All our framed video screens come with frontal tempered glass for screen protection, a standard VESA mount 75mm /100mm for installation and the port cover /locker for anti-tampering purpose. Working with retail peripherals for a variety of interactivity options Our retail solutions support full line of retail peripherals like push button, motion sensor, barcode scanner, RFID reader, LED lighting, etc. for various user interactivity. We also support custom projects making our retail video screens work with the retail products to deliver a real product demonstration, for example, A Ring branded doorbell's button will trigger a demo video on the 7-inch open frame retail screen 10cm away, when the button is pressed, the LED ring will be blink just like the real Ring doorbell on the home gate.
